title: [Draft Pick] Fizz - Chroma skin unselectable
body:
I was in a ranked match queue and selected Fizz as my champion. I was in the skin tab and then locked in. I then proceeded to go to the champion tab, then back to the skins tab and found that I was unable to select my Chroma skin as whichever other skins I had looked at before covered the location for colour selection and replaced the name with whichever skin I had selected prior.

I could not duplicate this glitch again but I felt i'd better report it.

Thanks

replies.body: I have the same glitch except for its permanent haha, I can never select the fizz chroma
Thanks for the report, Valanaro! I'll look into this. Please feel free to let me know if you get this glitch again! :]
